channel.title: Script Status Display - ATSB
channel.description:
This program alters your scripts, instead of display a status in a different window, it displays it under the script tab. This reduces CPU power as it no longer needs to run an extra window. = More BOTS!!!
This is actually a cut down of Regex's auto updater so credits to him. I got the program itself from Moparisthebest so credits to him to as he altered it a bit. Credits to me for the defs file.
First compile it: [code] javac Renamer.java [/code] Next run it: [code] java Renamer ./definitions.txt ./myScriptHere.java [/code] That's it. ENJOY!!

item.title: Script Status Display - ATSB
item.dc:creator: @danrox2004 danrox2004
item.description:
@danrox2004 wrote:

[quote=“jag024, post:4, topic:1610”]Okay, so first you like upon up notepad.

Then you copy and paste javac Renamer.java into it. You then save it as ANYTHING.bat.

Then you open notepad again and copy and paste java Renamer ./definitions.txt ./myScriptHere.java With the name of the script in there ie:

java Renamer ./definitions.txt ./IMPRimmington.java

Then you run the first one and then the second? Is this used with ATSB that you created or…?[/quote]
yes,
it modifys the script so instead of opening the status box in a new window, it opens it in the bot under the script tab

Read full topic

item.title: Script Status Display - ATSB
item.dc:creator: @danrox2004 danrox2004
item.description:
@danrox2004 wrote:

okay, first u create a bat file in the same directory which has in it

javac Renamer.java

then you run that bat file
next you create another bat file with the code

 java Renamer ./definitions.txt ./myScriptHere.java

and change the myScriptHere to whatever your script is and run it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

This program alters your scripts, instead of display a status in a different window, it displays it under the script tab. This reduces CPU power as it no longer needs to run an extra window. = More BOTS!!!
